sector_narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
description_narrative: The Policy Coordination initiative provides supports to the Policy Coordination Facility for design, procurement and implementation activities, specifically: small scale cross-sector grants programs; medium scale cross-sector grants programs; South-South cooperation; logistical arrangement to support official meetings, events and conferences; and support for whole of government programs to deliver these activities. The total value of this initiative is $1.7 million over 3 years, starting 2012-13.
